publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5143 Marlyn Glen: Hate and Discrimination Have No Place in Scottish Society—That the Parliament expresses its disgust at the intolerant and discriminatory remarks expressed by BNP leader Nick Griffin on BBC’s Question Time on 22 October 2009; reasserts its commitment to the key principle in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights that all human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights, and, in the run up to International Human Rights Day on 10 December 2009, reaffirms its commitment to tackling all forms of racism and discrimination in Scottish society, including that still perpetrated against women, ethnic minorities, Gypsy/Travellers and LGBT communities, among others.

S3M-5143 Marlyn Glen: Hate and Discrimination Have No Place in Scottish Society—That the Parliament expresses its disgust at the intolerant and discriminatory remarks expressed by BNP leader Nick Griffin on BBC’s Question Time on 22 October 2009; reasserts its commitment to the key principle in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights that all human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights, and, in the run up to International Human Rights Day on 10 December 2009, reaffirms its commitment to tackling all forms of racism and discrimination in Scottish society, including that still perpetrated against women, ethnic minorities, Gypsy/Travellers and LGBT communities, among others.
S3M-5143 Hate and Discrimination Have No Place in Scottish Society (lodged on 5 November 2009) Michael Matheson*

S3M-5143 Hate and Discrimination Have No Place in Scottish Society (lodged on 5 November 2009) Joe FitzPatrick*, Ken Macintosh*, Elaine Smith*, Liam McArthur*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Mike Pringle*, Lewis Macdonald*
S3M-5143 Hate and Discrimination Have No Place in Scottish Society (lodged on 5 November 2009) Dave Thompson*, George Foulkes*, Ian McKee*, Malcolm Chisholm*
S3M-5143 Hate and Discrimination Have No Place in Scottish Society (lodged on 5 November 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-5143 Hate and Discrimination Have No Place in Scottish Society (lodged on 5 November 2009) John Park*, Bill Butler*
S3M-5143 Hate and Discrimination Have No Place in Scottish Society (lodged on 5 November 2009) Karen Whitefield*
